item.title: C++ - Boost Graph Library
item.description: Graphs are one of the fundamental and most used data structures. It’s everywhere. However, there is no standard implementation of C++ STL. You need to implement it in your way or using 3rd party library like Boost. In this blog post, I use the Boost Graph library and try to show you how easy it is with example codes. I hope you’ll find it useful. Constructing a Graph The adjacency_list is a template class with six template parameters.
